definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Maslow felt that psychoanalysis and its emphasis on neuroses had its place.
sentences.chinese: 马斯洛认为，精神分析和神经症强调了它的位置。

sentences.english: But it’s impossible in biology,” Maslov said.
sentences.chinese: 但这对生物学来说不可实现，”马斯洛夫说道。

sentences.english: Like Maslow, he too, was the President of American Psychological Association.
sentences.chinese: 和马斯洛一样，也是美国心理协会会长。

sentences.english: It fitted well with Maslow’s non-authoritarian model of organisational structure.
sentences.chinese: 它很好的配合了马斯洛的非集权结构的组织模型。

sentences.english: But it’s impossible in biology, ” Maslov said.
sentences.chinese: 但这对生物学来说不可实现，”马斯洛夫说道。

sentences.english: Maslow's theory provides a foundation for the trans-cultural study on work values.
sentences.chinese: 马斯洛理论为工作价值观的跨文化研究提供基础。

sentences.english: The shared intentionality lies at the basis of human society, Dr. Tomasello argues.
sentences.chinese: 汤马斯洛博士认为共享意向是人类社会的基础。

sentences.english: Our findings suggest that Maslow's theory is largely correct.
sentences.chinese: 我们的研究表明马斯洛的理论在很大程度上是正确的。

sentences.english: The structure is built in layers according to Maslow's hierarchy of needs.
sentences.chinese: 结构是基于马斯洛需求一层一层建起来的。

sentences.english: Ultimately, this is what Maslow refers to as the key to happiness in life.
sentences.chinese: 最后的阶段，就是马斯洛所说的幸福的钥匙。

pinyin: xu1 qiu2 ceng2 ci4 li3 lun4

definition: Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
